name: INTENSIVE PROGRAM
description:
JOIN OUR MOVEMENT

CHANGE YOUR LIFE

NO MORE PEACEFUL LABYRINTHS!! NO MORE HAPPY MAZES!! THIS IS THE COSMOQUANTUM INTENSIVE PROGRAM!! WE WILL TEST YOUR LIMITS AND EXPAND YOUR BOUNDARIES! YOUR TRUE IDENTITY AWAITS! FIGHT FOR YOUR IDENTITY AND HELP YOUR FELLOW PATIENTS COMPLETE THEIRS! THIS IS NO TIME FOR HESITATION AND DOUBT!

THE COMMITTEE FOR THE PROPAGATION OF COSMOQUANTUM SOCIAL PSYCHOLOGY CAN HELP YOU!! LET US HELP YOU HELP YOURSELF AS YOU RECOVER YOUR IDENTITY BY FIGHTING YOUR WAY THRU MORE THAN 30 LEVELS AND 70 ENEMIES!!

Cosmoquantum intensive program is a chrono engine based coaching cult simulator, a parody of what it means to enter such a program and what it takes to complete such an intensive experience!. A quarantine experiment that has grown and is now ready to assist you in your inner journey to the 36 elements that make up an individual. Human existence has become absurd, we still have time to change it. The committee for the propagation of cosmoquantum social psychology, CPCQSP, can help you, only your participation is required.

With more than 40 pieces of 12 artists from mexico, chile & usa, cosmoquantum intensive program is a visual experience using comedy to explore individual and collective identities. Accept the challenge! The path to normality is fun and complex at the same time: only you can recover your identity!! The cqsp table shows the internal and external scales of the individual. The table is an idea, a concept, which is formed from an incessant and constant drip of information, which in turn forms a huge pool of wisdom available to anyone who needs it.

OBSERVATIONS

  • Time Play Approx. 8 hrs.
  • FLASHING TRIGGER WARNING:  game not recommended if flashing colors causes seizures.
  • In the latest version for MacOS Catalina, it has error when saving from the game app.     Select the game app (left click): Show package contents, ↳ Contents, ↳MacOS, ↳njws.     Click on njws (will open the game with Terminal), save error is fixed as long as it is opened through "njws".
